attributes.action: Prioritise essential workers for the next round of Covid-19 vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: Key workers have been working tirelessly throughout the last year of the pandemic risking their lives everyday. They simply cannot stay at home as they are essential to the country. They are at risk everyday they work from contracting Covid-19 therefore should be offered the next round of Covid-19 vaccines.
attributes.background: The government should debate this matter in parliament and get scientific advice to see how high the risk of contracting Covid-19 is for essential workers. Parliament should vote on this matter.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
